review: Works great for the preloaded apps such as Netflix and Amazon.  I brought it to a hotel and plugged it into the HDMI for the hotel TV and was able to connect to my accounts in just a couple minutes.  But don't expect to be able to easily and consistently project your laptop desktop to the device.  That does not work well.
author: Mark Jacobs

review: I have had my fitestick for about 2 weeks and it has worked well. I noticed that it was very hot last night and was having speed issues even though my phone showed 72 mbs WiFi. Did a power reset and that resolved the problem.
author: Gordon Neal

review: Started out halfway decent. Now i cant hardly watch movies or anything on it. Delighted that my job bought it and i didnt waste my own money on this thing. Seems to be constantly turning itself off and back on in the middle of netflix, loses signal on flixster, etc.
